original_text: and when they come from the marketplace, they do not eat unless they wash. And there are many other traditions that they observe, such as the washing of cups and pots and copper vessels and dining couches.)
korean_text: 또 시장에서 돌아와서도 물을 뿌리지 않고서는 먹지 아니하며 그 외에도 여러 가지를 지키어 오는 것이 있으니 잔과 주발과 놋그릇을 씻음이러라)

sentences.original_text: and when they come from the marketplace
they do not eat unless they wash.
And there are many other traditions
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 지키는 다른 많은 전통이 있으며

sentences.original_text: such as the washing of cups
sentences.korean_translation: 예를 들어 잔을 씻는 것과 같은 것들
